__prompts__.author: Enter the authors name
__prompts__.project_description: Add a short description to the project
__prompts__.url: Add an URL that is associated with your project (optional)
__prompts__.project_slug: This is your python module slug (confirm or change)
__prompts__.approvaltests_geo_data_at_ci_vm: (Approvaltest) Set the path at CI for the VM
__prompts__.approvaldata_timestamp: (Approvaltest) Set a timestamp for the Approval Data
__prompts__.external_pypis: Add an external PyPI if one is needed
__prompts__.package_docker: Do you want to package Docker?
__prompts__.check_code_quality_in_ci: Do you want to check the code quality with ruff in CI?
__prompts__.include_docs: Do you want to include Code Documentation?
